name: HoloGraham Demo
description:
I was captured by someone, not sure who, and now I'm trying to escape with my life! Hopefully me and my holograms can figure our way out of here! - Graham

Holo-Graham

Holo-Graham is a strategic puzzle game based in a 4D World!
Record your 'holo-grahams' to perform actions in real time and work along side them to solve complex puzzles.

The full game consists of 30 hand made, and thoroughly tested levels.
This demo contains the tutorial levels and 6 of the final levels.

Although the levels in this demo are not as complex as the levels later in the game, they should give you a great understanding of the game play and hopefully encourage you to vote for my game on steam! Vote yes to show your support!

Figure out the series of switches and time their activation to compete the level within the allotted time of your power bar. If your power bar depletes, your holo-grahams malfunction.
